name: Bareback
description:
Introduction

Bareback is mostly an open canyon that contains one section of excellent high-stemming. Potholes exist, but can be walked around. Bring gear if you want to play in the potholes. Even though this canyon has no required rappels, it is NOT well suited for recreational hikers.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Permit required from the Navajo Nation

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

https://dyeclan.com/outdooractivities/canyoneering/?id=683

Background
